1103:707: na yujyate mama dveṣo buddhādīnāṃ na hi vyathā||64||
1103:711: kutaḥ ? yasmādbuddhādīnāṃ bodhisattvāryaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ vitathābhiniveśaprasūtātmagrāhanivṛtterabhiṣvaṅgābhāvānna vyathā cittapīḍālakṣaṇaṃ daurmanasyaṃ nāsti|
1103:714: tathā viruddhadharmakāriṣu karuṇaiva tu yujyate teṣu sādhūnām|
1103:726: tathā priyāṇāṃ premasthānānāṃ cāpakāriṣu kopaṃ nivārayediti saṃbandhaḥ |
1103:731: tadanena yathā aparasamaye devagurudvijātimātāpitṛprabhṛtīnāmarthe pāpaṃ kurvato'pi na doṣa iti matam,
1103:733: kiṃ ca | idamapi vastutattvaṃ manasi kurvatā na sattveṣu cittaṃ dūṣayitavyamityāha-
1103:735: sā vyathā cetane dṛṣṭā kṣamasvaināṃ vyathāmataḥ ||66||
1103:737: sā ca sāmagrī vastudharmatayā kācit kvacit samarthasvabhāvā|
1103:742: svayameva yadṛcchayā vā loṣṭakuḍyādyabhighātajanitā vā dehināṃ śarīriṇāṃ niyatā vyathā niyamena samutpadyate|
1103:744: sā caivaṃ dvividhakāraṇasāmagrīprasūtāpi cetane savijñānake kāye dṛṣṭā pramāṇapariniścitā|
1103:748: tato yad yasyotpattisthānaṃ tat tatraiva bhavati nānyatra,
1103:750: ataḥ asmānyāyāt kṣamasva sahasva enāmanantarakathitobhayarūpāṃ vyathām||
1103:751: tadānīmubhayorapi sādhāraṇadūṣaṇatayā kvacidapi kopo na yukta iti kathayitumāha-
1103:753: brūmaḥ kameṣu nirdoṣaṃ kaṃ vā brūmo'parādhinam||67||
1103:762: idamapi ca ātmagatameva cintayatā pratighacittaṃ nivartayitavyamityāha-
1103:763: kasmādevaṃ kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ yenaivaṃ bādhyase paraiḥ|
1103:772: sarve duḥkhahetavaḥ karmapratyayopajanitapravṛttayaḥ iti ko'hamatra anyathākṛtau tatphalanivartanāya ? na kaścit|
1103:775: evaṃ buddhvā tu puṇyeṣu tathā yatnaṃ karomyaham|
1103:777: ete sattvāḥ karmakleśaparāyattāḥ parasparamasamañjasakarmakāriṇo nivartayitumaśakyā iti|
1103:778: evaṃ buddhvā jñātvā punaḥ puṇyeṣu kuśaleṣu karmasu tathā yatnaṃ karomyaham,
1103:780: yena tathāvidhaṃ sāmarthyaṃ pratilabhya sanmārge pravartitāḥ santaḥ sarve maitracittā hitasukhavidhānatatparāḥ parasparamanyonyaṃ bhaviṣyanti||
1103:781: drohacittaṃ vinivartya priyavastūpaghātakāriṇi laukikodāharaṇena dveṣaṃ nivartayediti ślokadvayamupadarśayannāha-
1103:786: ekasmin gṛhe'gninā dahyamāne yathā tasmād gṛhādanyad gṛhaṃ gṛhāntaraṃ gatvā|
1103:788: tadantargatamanyadapi vastu mā dhākṣīditi śaṅkayā tadākṛṣyāpanīyate,
1103:791: evamuktodāharaṇanyāyena cittaṃ mano yasya vastuna āsaṅgādāsakto dahyate paritapyate dveṣavahninā pratighānalena tadāsaṅgasthānaṃ vastu tatkṣaṇaṃ na kālāntarapalimbena parityājyaṃ tatrābhiniveśaḥ parihartavyaḥ|
1103:795: tasya uktakrameṇa uddāhaḥ parikṣayo mā bhūt|
1103:804: pratyuta labdhalābhamātmānaṃ manyate atyalpamidaṃ maraṇaduḥkhāt karacchedanaduḥkhamiti|
1103:805: tathā yo'pi manuṣyaduḥkhaṃ tāḍanabandhanatiraskārādikṛtamanubhūya narakaduḥkhādvimukto bhavati,
1103:811: athāpi syāt-na mayā svalpamātre'pi duḥkhe kṣamā kartuṃ śakyata iti, atrāha-
1103:814: khaṭacapeṭaloṣṭādiprahārakṛtamīṣanmātramapi duḥkhamidānīṃ soḍhuṃ marṣituṃ na pāryate na śakyate|
1103:816: tadayaṃ nārakaduḥkhasaṃvartanīyaḥ krodhaḥ kopaḥ kasmātkāraṇānna vāryate ?
1103:817: ayameva hi atitarāṃ narakeṣu duḥkhadāyaka iti duḥkhabhīrūṇāmeva krodhaṃ nivartayituṃ yuktaṃ syāt||
1103:818: kiṃ ca| yadyapi soḍhuṃ na śakyate,
1103:821: marṣaṇāt punastasya mahārthalābho bhaviṣyatīti vṛttadvayena śikṣayitumāha-
1103:823: kārito'smi na cātmārthaḥ parārtho vā kṛto mayā||74||
1103:824: na cedaṃ tādṛśaṃ duḥkhaṃ mahārthaṃ ca kariṣyati|
1103:831: evaṃ duḥkhamanubhavatāpi mayā na ca naiva ātmārthaḥ dṛṣṭādṛṣṭaphalasādhanaḥ kṛto niṣpāditaḥ|
1103:834: tadadyāpi na tathaiva mamāsahiṣṇutā yuktetyāha-idaṃ duḥkhaṃ naiva tādṛśaṃ yādṛśaṃ narakasamudbhavam|
1103:835: atha ca mahārthaṃ sarvasattvahitasukhavidhānabhūtaṃ buddhatvaṃ sādhayiṣyati|
1103:836: ato jagato duḥkhahare trijagatparyāpannasarvasattvaduḥkhapraśamanakare duḥkhe prītirevātra yujyate nāruciriti bhāvaḥ||
1103:839: manastvamapi taṃ stutvā kasmādevaṃ na hṛṣyasi||76||
1103:840: guṇādhikaṃ stutvā yadi prītisukhaṃ kaiścit prāptam,
1103:841: tadā he manaḥ tvamapi tadguṇasaṃvarṇanena kimiti harṣasukhaṃ nānubhavasi ?
1103:846: yatra yatra ratiṃ yāti manaḥ sukhavimohitam|
1103:850: idaṃ ca te hṛṣṭisukhaṃ niravadyaṃ sukhodayam|
1103:854: idaṃ ca paraguṇāśrayaṃ hṛṣṭisukhaṃ niravadyaṃ tava,
1103:857: ata eva na vāritaṃ ca guṇibhirbhagavacchāsanavidhijñaiḥ|
1103:860: guṇeṣu evamayaṃ matsarīti manyamānā anye'pi sattvā āvarjitā bhavanti,
1103:863: kiṃ tarhi tāvattasyaiva sukhametaditi mayā soḍhumaśakyamiti| atrāha-
1103:864: tasyaiva sukhamityevaṃ tavedaṃ yadi na priyam|
1103:866: tasyaiva stutikartuḥ sukhamiti evamanenābhiprāyeṇa bhavato yadi idaṃ paraguṇastutipratisamudbhavaṃ sukhaṃ na priyam,
1103:869: yadapi ca bhavataḥ svātmasukhanimittaṃ svabhṛtyādiṣu bhṛtidānaṃ karmamūlyadānam,
1103:877: kiṃ ca| mithyottaramevedaṃ bhavata iti pratipādayannāha-
1103:888: tasyaiva sukhamityevaṃ tavedaṃ yadi na priyam| iti|
1103:895: yataḥ sarvasattvāḥ triadhātukāntaścarāḥ samastasukhasaṃpattisaṃtarpitā buddhatvamadhigamya mayā kartavyāḥ iti manasikāreṇa bodhicittamutpādyate|
1103:900: iti akaraṇīyameva tat parasukhavaimukhyacittaṃ bodhisattvasyeti bhāvaḥ||
1103:901: yaḥ punarutpāditabodhicitto'pi parasya lābhasatkārasaṃpattimabhisamīkṣya tadīrṣyākaṣāyitahṛdayaḥ tenaiva śokena dahyate,
1103:905: athavā syādetat-na khalu mayā tatsukhameva na mṛṣyate,
1103:907: trayo lokāeva kāmarūpārūpyadhātulakṣaṇāḥ lokaprasiddhayā vā svargādisvabhāvāḥ trailokyam,
1103:917: puṣṇāti yastvayā poṣyaṃ tubhyameva dadāti saḥ|
1103:919: tvayā poṣaṇīyaṃ priyaputrakādikaṃ tvadīyaṃ yaḥ puṣṇāti,
1103:922: ataḥ tvatkuṭumbajīvinaṃ tvadīyaṃ kuṭumbaṃ jīvayati yaḥ,
1103:923: taṃ tathāvidhaṃ puruṣaṃ labdhvā prāpya prahṛṣyasi na ?
1103:926: tathā prakṛte'pi yena sarvasattvā ātmīyatvena gṛhītāḥ,
1103:930: sa kiṃ necchasi sattvānāṃ yasteṣāṃ bodhimicchati|
1103:936: tathāpi yaḥ samutpāditabodhicittaḥ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ bodhiṃ buddhatvamicchati,
1103:946: api ca| aparasya lābhasatkārasaṃpadabhāve'pi na bhavatastadbhāvasaṃbhavaḥ|
1103:947: tatkimakāraṇameva tadvidveṣiṇā ātmaghātāya yatnaḥ kriyate iti pratipādayannāha-
1103:948: yadi tena na tallabdhaṃ sthitaṃ dānapatergṛhe|
1103:949: sarvathāpi na tatte'sti dattādattena tena kim||84||
1103:950: yadi nāma tena tava akṣamāviṣayeṇa sattvena taddīyamānaṃ vastu na labdham,
1103:953: sarvathāpi tena labdhena gṛhāvasthitena vā na tadvastu tavāsti|
1103:959: labhamāno na gṛhṇātu vada kena na kupyasi||85||
1103:961: sa kiṃ vārayatu puṇyāni pūrvajanmakṛtāni vipākonmukhāni,
1103:969: brūhi kena prakāreṇa atra na bhavato'paritoṣaḥ syāt|
1103:970: tatra puṇyādīnāṃ vārayitumaśakyatvāt labhyamānāgrahaṇe'pi sarvathāpi na tatte'stītyādinā bādhakasyoktatvāditi na kiṃcit paritoṣakāraṇamasti||
1103:975: na kevalaṃ tvamātmānaṃ kṛtapāpaṃ na śocasi|
1103:984: yat kiṃcit sukhaṃ tat sarvaṃ puṇyaprasūtam|
1103:985: iti sukhābhilāṣiṇā śubhe karmaṇi udyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ|
1103:989: iti kathaṃ kṛtapuṇyaiḥ saha spardhā yujyate ?
1103:993: tava śatrordveṣaviṣayasya tvadabhilāṣamātreṇa apriyamaniṣṭaṃ jātamutpannaṃ ced yadi,
1103:1005: atha tvadicchayā siddhaṃ tadduḥkhe kiṃ sukhaṃ tava|
1103:1006: yadi nāma tavecchayā siddhaṃ niṣpannamapriyaṃ śatroḥ,
1103:1007: tathāpi tasya duḥkhe samutpanne kiṃ sukhaṃ tava ? na kiṃcit|
1103:1009: nanu idameva prayojanaṃ yat tadduḥkhe mama saṃtuṣṭirityata āha-
1103:1011: evamapi paraduḥkhaparitoṣe yadi arthaḥ prayojanaṃ bhavet,
1103:1012: tadā ataḥ paraḥ anarthaḥ ko nu ?
1103:1020: kleśā eva baḍiśena carantīti bāḍiśikāḥ tairarpitamādattam|
1103:1023: narakapālā yamapuruṣāḥ tvāṃ krītvā pakṣyanti pakṣyante|
1103:1029: stutiryaśo'tha satkāro na puṇyāya na cāyuṣe|
1103:1030: na balārthaṃ na cārogye na ca kāyasukhāya me||90||
1103:1039: iyāneva hi svārtho bhavato bhavet prajñāvataḥ svārthavedinaḥ|
1103:1049: tadicchatā madyaṃ dyūtaṃ gaṇikā pāradārikaṃ sevanīyaṃ syāt|
1103:1052: tasmāt saumanasya heturbhavato'pi stutyādayo bālajanānandakāriṇo'nupādeyā eva||
1103:1055: kecinmohapuruṣāḥ tādṛśaguṇāt svayamatisudūre vartamānā api śakrādiguṇaiḥ stūyamānā bandijanairanyaiśca protphullanayanavadanā yaśorthino hastyaśvādidhanaṃ tṛṇavat tebhyaḥ prayacchanti|
1103:1056: tathā taireva guṇaiḥ saṃbhāvitātmanāmapi śakravat śatruvijayasamudbhūtaṃ yaśo mama jagati vipulatāṃ gamiṣyati,
1103:1060: kimakṣarāṇi bhakṣyāṇi mṛte kasya ca tatsukham||92||
1103:1061: stutyādyabhidhāyakāni akṣarāṇi varṇāḥ kiṃ bhakṣyāṇi carvitavyāni ?
1103:1062: yaśorthaṃ mṛte sati kasya ca tat sukhaṃ yaśaḥśravaṇasamuttham ?
1103:1065: yathā kaścid bālo dhūlimayagṛheṇa paramaparitoṣeṇa parikrīḍamānaḥ kenacit tasmin bhagne mahadduḥkhena parigṛhītaḥ paramārtipīḍita iva madgṛhaṃ bhagnamiti karuṇasvaraṃ krandati,
1103:1068: tathaiva stutiyaśohānau vighāte svacittaṃ duḥkhamāviśat pratibhāsate vicārayato mama|
1103:1069: atrāpi na vastusatā kenacid vipralambha iti parāmarṣṭavyam||
1103:1070: punaranyathā vicāreṇa bāladharma evāyamiti caturbhiḥ ślokaiḥ parāmṛśayannāha-
1103:1074: sa śabdo māṃ stauti madīyaṃ varṇamudīrayati|
1103:1085: anyatra mayi vā prītyā kiṃ hi me parakīyayā|
1103:1086: tasyaiva tatprītisukhaṃ bhāgo nālpo'pi me tataḥ||95||
1103:1087: yasmādanyasmin mayi vā prītyā parasaṃtānavartinyā kimāyātaṃ mama ? na kiṃcit|
1103:1088: kutaḥ ? tasyaiva tato ya eva prītaḥ stutikartā,
1103:1090: ato bhāgo nālpo'pi īṣadapi mama tataḥ parasaṃtānavartinaḥ prītisukhāt||
1103:1092: tat kimiti tato bhāgo nāstīti ? atrāha-
1103:1096: tadā tasminnanyatra prasādena sukhite'pi mamāstu tatsukhitvam|
1103:1098: na tvanyasmin prasādena sukhiteṣu mama sukham||
1103:1103: tadanyanimittābhāvāt ahaṃ stuta ityevaṃ vikalpanāt prītirātmabni jāyate,
1103:1106: ātmanyapi evamuktakrameṇa asaṃbandhādapratyāsatteḥ kāraṇāt kevalaṃ bālavilasitametat||
1103:1107: api ca| stutyādayo mama apacayameva dadhatītyupadarśayannāha-
1103:1109: guṇavatsu ca mātsaryaṃ saṃpatkopaṃ ca kurvate||98||
1103:1117: tadguṇāsahanatayā vā saṃpadi lābhasatkārādisvabhāvāyāṃ kopaṃ ca amarṣaṃ kurvate teṣveva|
1103:1124: stutyādighātāya virodhāya ye sattvā mama pratyupasthitā udyatāḥ|
1103:1126: tato rakṣārthaṃ trāṇārthaṃ rakṣaṇanimittaṃ pravṛttā udyuktā nanu te mama|
1103:1131: ye mocayanti māṃ bandhādveṣasteṣu kathaṃ mama||100||
1103:1135: kalyāṇamitrakṛtyakāriṇaḥ śatrutvenābhimatā vimocayanti viyojayanti māṃ bandhāt saṃsāraduḥkhalakṣaṇāt lābhādisvabhāvādvā|
1103:1147: kuśalavighātaḥ kṛto'nena ityevaṃ manasi nidhāya atra puṇyavighātakāriṇi dveṣo na yujyate|
1103:1148: kasmāt ? yataḥ kṣāntyā titikṣayā samaṃ tulyaṃ tapaḥ sukṛtaṃ nāsti sarvaśubhakarmahetutvāt|
1103:1153: tatra pradveṣe tu ātmanaiva puṇyavighātaḥ kṛto bhavedityāha-
1103:1156: atha yadi ātmana eva doṣeṇa asahiṣṇutātmakena na karomi kṣamāṃ kṣāntimiha vighnakāriṇi,
1103:1157: tadā mayaiva na punaranyena atra puṇye kṛto vighnaḥ|
1103:1163: yo hi yena vinā nāsti yasmiṃśca sati vidyate|
1103:1164: sa eva kāraṇaṃ tasya sa kathaṃ vighna ucyate||104||
1103:1165: yo bhāvaḥ kāryābhimataḥ yena kāraṇābhimatena vinā nāsti,
1103:1170: evaṃ prakṛte'pi sa janaka eva kathaṃ tasya janyasya vighna ucyate vighātaheturabhidhīyate ?
1103:1171: tathāvidhe'pi tathā vyavahāraṃ kurvato nāsti vipratipattiḥ||
1103:1174: na ca pravrājake prāpte pravrajyāvighna ucyate||105||
1103:1175: na yasmāt kasyaciddānapaterditsākāle eva saṃprāptenārthinā yācanakena dānavighnaḥ kṛtaḥ ityucyate,
1103:1177: tathā kasyacit pravrajitukāmasya pravrājakasamavadhānaṃ pravrajyā saṃvarādigrahaṇasvabhāvā,
1103:1182: api ca| kṣāntiheturatidurlabha iti tatsamāgame prītireva yujyate ityupadarśayannāha-
1103:1184: atipracuraprāptikā yācanakā loke sarvatra sarveṣāṃ dīyamānagrahaṇāvaimukhyāt,
1103:1187: yadi kathaṃcit kaścit syādvā na veti|
1103:1190: yasmādanaparādhasya nivṛttaparāpakārasya mama nirnimittaṃ na kaścideko'pi aparādhyati,
1103:1197: tasmād gṛhe prādurbhūto nidhiriva śramamantareṇaivādhigato ripurabhilaṣaṇīya eva mayā syāt,
1103:1199: evaṃvidhe paramapuruṣārthe sāhāyyaṃ bhajamānasya pratyupakārakaraṇameva kṛtajñatayā mama yuktamityupadarśayannāha-
1103:1202: yasmādasau tatra sāhāyyaṃ kurvan kāraṇameva na vighnaḥ tasmānmayā kṣamāmabhyastatā,
1103:1206: kṣamāphalaṃ dharmādhigamalakṣaṇam etasmai dharmasahāyāya prathamamagrato dātavyaṃ mayā iti praṇidhātavyam|
1103:1209: eṣa eva pūrvaṃ kāraṇaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathoktā|
1103:1213: kṣamāsiddhayāśayo nāsya tena pūjyo na cedariḥ|
1103:1217: tena kāraṇena kuśalaheturapi yadi śatruḥ pūjanīyo na bhavati,
1103:1218: evaṃ tarhi kuśalaniṣpattihetuḥ nirabhiprāyo'pi saddharmaḥ pravacanalakṣaṇaḥ kathaṃ pūjyate ?
1103:1219: so'pi tadāśayaśūnyatvāt pūjanīyo na syāt, iti bhāvaḥ||
1103:1225: ityevamabhisaṃdhāya śatruryadi na pūjyate dānamānairna satkriyate|
1103:1226: anyatheti apakāriṇi dveṣacittamanivārayataḥ kathaṃ mama kṣāntiḥ ?
1103:1227: tadapakāramasahamānasya pratyapakāraṃ vā kurvato naiva yuktetyarthaḥ|
1103:1238: ataḥ asmāddhetoḥ tasya duṣṭāśayameva pratītya nimittīkṛtya samupajāyate kṣamā|
1103:1240: ataḥ asmāt sa eva yasyāśayaṃ pratītyotpadyate kṣamā kṣamāhetuḥ,
1103:1258: kutaḥ ? yato yasmādetān sattvān jināṃśca ārādhya ānukūlyānuṣṭhānena bahavo buddhatvamadhigamya sarvalaukikalokottarasarvasaṃpattiparyantaṃ prāptāḥ||
1103:1260: tathāpi tathāgataiḥ saha sādhāraṇatā na yukteti| atrāha-
1103:1262: jineṣu gauravaṃ yadvanna sattveṣviti kaḥ kramaḥ||113||
1103:1263: ubhayebhyo'pi buddhadharmāṇāṃ balavaiśāradyādīnāmāgame pratilambhe tulye aviśiṣṭe|
1103:1265: ataḥ sādhāraṇe'pi hetubhāve jineṣu gauravaṃ yadvat,
1103:1269: nanu ca sattvānāṃ rāgādimalairhīnāśayatvāt kāraṇatve'pi kathaṃ bhagavatsamānatā yujyate ityāśaṅkayāha-
1103:1270: āśayasya ca māhātmyaṃ na svataḥ kiṃ tu kāryataḥ|
1103:1271: samaṃ ca tena māhātmyaṃ sattvānāṃ tena te samāḥ||114||
1103:1273: tathāpi upayuktopayogitvena hetubhāvasya tulyatvāt samaṃ māhātmyamucyate|
1103:1274: tena hetunā te sattvāḥ samāḥ jinaistulyā ucyante iti nātra viśeṣaḥ kriyate||
1103:1288: paramārthatastu na buddhairbhagavadbhiḥ samāḥ kecit sattvāḥ santi|
1103:1301: dṛśyate tasya pūjārthaṃ trailokyamapi na kṣamam||117||
1103:1306: tasya tadguṇādhārasya pūjānimittaṃ trailokyamapi na kṣamam|
1103:1316: aparyantopakāriṇāṃ niṣkṛtiḥ tatkṛtāpakārasya niṣkrayaṇaṃ pariśodhanamiti yāvat|
1103:1319: prabhucittānukūlavartina eva bhṛtyasya vāñchitaṃ sidhyatītyavagamya sattvārādhanamevopādeyamiti pratipādayannāha-
1103:1321: yeṣāṃ kṛte tatra kṛte kṛtaṃ syāt|
1103:1324: karacaraṇaśironayanasvamāṃsāni chittvā chittvā pradattāni yeṣāṃ hitasukhavidhānāya,
1103:1325: tathā avīcīmapi paraduḥkhaduḥkhino yeṣāṃ kṛte praviśanti tatsamuddharaṇāya|
1103:1327: tatra teṣu sattveṣu kṛte kṛtaṃ syāt|
1103:1328: anyathā tu kṛtamapi na kṛtaṃ bhavet|
1103:1330: yenaivam, tena paramāpakāriṣvapi na cittaṃ dūṣayitavyam|
1103:1331: kiṃ tu sarvamanekaprakāraṃ kāyavāṅmanobhirvā kalyāṇameva hitasukhameva vidhātavyameteṣu||
1103:1337: mama svāmina eva buddhādayaḥ svayameva ātmanaiva|
1103:1342: tadahaṃ punaḥ teṣāṃ bhṛtyaḥ teṣu sattveṣu prabhuputreṣvatyantapriyeṣu kathaṃ karomi mānam,
1103:1346: ito'pi ca sattvāpakāraṃ parityajya tadārādhanameva kartavyamityāha-
1103:1351: yeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ priyaputrāṇāmiva pitaro munīndrā buddhā bhagavantaḥ sukhe kāyamanojanmani mudaṃ harṣaṃ yānti,
1103:1352: yeṣāṃ ca duḥkhe manyuṃ praviśanti aparitoṣamāsādayanti|
1103:1364: samantāt sarvāvayavānabhivyāpya vahninā prajvalitaśarīrasya yathā pañcakāmaguṇairna saumanasyam,
1103:1367: tadvat tathaiva sattvānāṃ vyathāyāṃ duḥkhavedanāyāṃ na prīteḥ saumanasyasya upāyo heturasti kṛpātmakānāṃ bhagavatām||
1103:1379: yadi pratirūpamācaritaṃ tatra me kṣāntiṃ kurvantu anukampāmupādāya||
1103:1385: tathāgatānāmabhipretasaṃpādanāya loke lokaviṣaye sarvātmanā kāyena vācā manasā vā dāsībhāvaṃ svīkaromi|
1103:1386: te'pi me prasādaṃ kurvanto mastake pādaṃ nidadhatu|
1103:1388: anena mayi purvāparādhamapāsya jagatāṃ patirbhagavān saṃtuṣṭamānaso bhavatu||
1103:1389: bhagavatsu ca gauravakāribhiḥ sattveṣvanādaro na kartavya iti prasādhayannāha-
1103:1394: sarvatragadharmadhātuprativedhāt sarvasattvasamatāpādanaparātmaparivartanādinā vā ātmīkṛtaṃ svīkṛtaṃ sarvamidaṃ jagat,
1103:1399: tasmāt sattvarūpeṇa buddhā bhagavanta evaite sattvā dṛśyante|
1103:1417: sa ca āgāmirājadaṇḍabhayadarśitayā mahājano vacanamātreṇāpi yāvadvikāramupagantumasamarthaḥ|
1103:1420: yasmānnaiva sa ekākī tasya rājabalaṃ balam|
1103:1436: na tu punaḥ sattvāprasaktiphalasya rājāparādhaphalena samānatā samastītyāha-
1103:1442: kiṃbhūtam ? yena duḥkhajātena nārakī vedanā anubhūyate||
